name: Customia
description: Customia is a team of experts in marketing and technology Internet oriented social networks with a permanent commitment of quality and service to their customers, identifying their needs in a market in constant change and evolution. Their mission is to develop innovative technology-based solutions oriented to the Internet, providing its customers with products and services that enable them to increase their sales
